extension.summary: Script to toggle the power of an LG TV
extension.description: Script to toggle the power of an LG TV. This uses CEC to get the TV status and turn the TV on, and the Kodi.Script.TurnOffLGTV addon to turn it off.
extension.disclaimer: This requires the cec-client command to be installed, which is part of the cec-util debian package. It also works most reliably with Kodi's CEC support disabled (Settings -> System -> Input -> Peripherals -> CEC Adapter).
